attributes.action: Reverse the appointment of Andrea Leadsom as "Environment Minister".
attributes.additional_details: For additional information, please review Andrea Leadsom's voting record: https://www.theyworkforyou.com/mp/24829/andrea_leadsom/south_northamptonshire/votes#environment
attributes.background: Andrea Leadsom voted against prevention of climate change; voted for lower taxes on fuel; voted for the sell-off of England's forests; has a mixed record on low-carbon energy generation; supported unnecessary badger culling; and appears undecided about whether or not she is for or against fracking.
